name: RITA BOWMAN’S BAKED SALMON
ingredients: 1 whole filet salmon (1 side of fish)
Chopped raw shrimp, scallops or crab meat
instructions: Add 2 cups crushed Ritz crackers & Bremmer wafers, parsley, dill, salt & pepper, chopped raw shrimp, scallops or crab meat. I usually combine shrimp & scallops but if you don’t like them use lump crab.
Tap cracker crumb mixture onto salmon.
Wrap in foil & bake at 325 until salmon is cooked.  It takes some time because the salmon is thick. About 1 hour
